interpreter

Class CommandAdd

  • java.lang.Object
    • interpreter.Command
      • interpreter.CommandAdd

  • public class CommandAdd
extends Command
    Class for Add command, which contains task name, 2 sets of date and time, a list of tags , a location and boolean variable to indicate missing arguments. //@author A0115329J

      • DEFAULT_LOCATION

        public static java.lang.String DEFAULT_LOCATION

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommandAdd

        public CommandAdd(java.lang.String newTaskName,
                  java.util.Calendar newStartDate,
                  java.util.Calendar newEndDate,
                  java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> newTags,
                  java.lang.String newLocation,
                  java.lang.String userInput,
                  boolean hasMissingArgs)
        Constructor for the Add command object. It is initialised with a task name, start date and time, end date and time, a list of tags and a boolean variable to indicate if there are missing arguments.
        Parameters:
        newTaskName - the task name of the new add command
        newStartDate - the starting date and time of the task to add
        newEndDate - the ending date and time of the task to add
        newTags - the list of tags associated with the new add command
        newLocation - the location of the new task to add
        hasMissingArgs - boolean variable to indicate missing arguments

    • Method Detail
